function.name: dishWashing_cancel
function.description: This function is used to cancel an in-progress dishwashing cycle on a specified SmartThings dishwasher.

location.description: The location where the dishwasher is located.

room.description: The room where the dishwasher is located.

device.description: The name of the dishwasher whose dishwashing cycle needs to be canceled.

compartment.description: The predefined compartment of the dishwasher whose dishwashing cycle needs to be canceled.
